data.message: Nobody cares about all the stabs Em took on everyone else but if he says Trump OMFG. People take politics way too personal. No matter the President they aren't going to come put your big boy pants on for you in the morning. They give two shits about you.

replies.message: Yeah tbh I support Trump but idgaf that Em trashes him. Who HASN'T Em trashed at this point? It's kind of his thing.
Because usually he is a leader ahead of the game, bashing Trump just makes him a weak liberal follower.

He's attacked Bush, Bill and Hillary Clinton in the past. But those were different times with no FB or a very open social network. Today, Trump has very loyal supporters, some of which are very vocal/proud about it (which is their right). FB, Twitter, etc. makes Eminem's "Fuck Trump" message reach everybody and increase the chances of triggering said Trump supporter. It's just the world we live in, and personally I don't care about his views, as long as he's making dope music and staying out of trouble (e.g. joining a violent rally, committing violence, etc.)
Matthew Hah you took the words out my mouth...
Jay, nobody likes trump besides the "toy soldiers" that feel good with camo, and a rifle on their back..😂
No the Trump supporters do. They immediately think that if you diss Trump you're pro Clinton or liberal lol.
Em used to trash people that were hard to hit .. now he's just being a conformist. If he had balls he'd go after Amy Schumer.
I'd love to see him go after Amy Schumer lmao
Matthew Herron I think that's one we could all agree on to be fair xD
Don't forget all the hateful anti gay rhetoric that Eminem spit for years.
Eminem's a bitch, just like you Nick
They think Eminem hates Bill Clinton because he always talks about Monica, but really Eminem just like blow jobs. XD
